name: Serious Heat: Moroccan Chermoula, an Underrated Hot Sauce-Marinade-Paste
description: Note: On Wednesdays, Andrea Lynn, senior editor of Chile Pepper magazine, drops by with Serious Heat. Chiles and fresh produce are everywhere in Morocco, including this serene scene on the edge of the Atlas Mountains. Do you need to rev...
recipeIngredient: 1 small yellow onion, peeled and chopped, or 3 whole scallions, chopped
1. In a food processor or blender, add onion or scallions, garlic, chiles, paprika, cumin, salt, pepper, lemon juice and water.
2. Purée ingredients, adding enough canola oil while blending to make mixture emulsify.
3. Taste, and adjust salt, pepper and lemon juice, if needed.
